text: Nu Generation is a group best known for their hit single "In Your Arms (Rescue Me)", a cover of the Fontella Bass song. The song entered the UK Singles Chart on 22 January 2000 at No. 8, its highest placement on the chart. Later that same year, it appeared in the top 100 of the singles charts in Belgium, France, Germany, and the Netherlands. ==References== Category:British musical groups
title: Nu Generation
